file.name: openapi.yaml
file.content:
security:
  - jwtBearer: []
info:
  title: Schul-Cloud User Service API
  description:
    This is the API specification for the Schul-Cloud User service.
    
  contact:
    name: support
    email: info@dbildungscloud.de
  license:
    name: GPL-3.0
    url: 'https://github.com/hpi-schul-cloud/schulcloud-server/blob/master/LICENSE'
  version: 1.0.0
servers:
  - url: /courses/v2
components:
  securitySchemes:
    jwtBearer:
      type: http
      scheme: bearer
      bearerFormat: JWT
  schemas:
    course_details:
      description: Data Transfer Object containing userdata
      type: object
      properties:
        name:
          type: string
        color:
          type: string
        times:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/time_details'
        itemDetails:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/item_details'
    time_details:
      type: object
      properties:
        weekday:
          type: integer
          minimum: 0
          maximum: 6
        startTime:
          type: integer
          description: Time in miliseconds from midnight.
        duration:
          description: value in miliseconds
          type: number
        eventId:
          type: string
        room:
          type: string
      required:
        - weekday
    item_details:
      type: object
      properties:
        published:
          type: boolean
        title:
          type: string
        dueDate:
          type: string
          format: date-time
        type:
          type: string
          enum: ['document', 'task']
paths:
  '/course/{id}':
    get:
      parameters:
        - name: id
          in: path
          schema:
            type: string
            pattern: '^[0-9a-f]{24}$'
          description: ID of the course to be returned
          required: true
      responses:
        '200':
          description: success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/course_details'
        '401':
          description: not authenticated
        '403':
          description: Forbidden
        '404':
          description: If there is no course with the given id.
        '500':
          description: general error
      description: Retrieves a single resource with the given id from the service.
      summary: ''
      tags:
        - courses
      security: []
openapi: 3.0.2
